ARABIC: وَإِذَا دُعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِذَا فَرِيقٌ مِّنْهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they are summoned to Allah and His Messenger, so that he can judge between them, a group of them immediately turn away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When they are called to God and His Prophet, that he may judge between them, a section of them turns away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When they are called to Allah and His Messenger so that the Messenger may judge between them, a party of them turns away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When they are called to God and His Messenger so that they will judge among them, suddenly, some of them turn away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when called towards Allah and His Noble Messenger in order that the Noble Messenger may judge between them, thereupon a group among them turns away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when they are called to Allah and His Messenger, to judge between them, lo! a party of them refuses and turns away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when they are called to Allah and His Apostle that he may judge between them, lo! a party of them turn aside.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When they are called to God and His Messenger that he may judge between them, lo, a party of them are swerving aside;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when they appeal unto Allah and His messenger to judge between them, lo! a faction of them are averse;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when they are called to God and His Messenger so that he may judge between them, some of them turn away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when they are called to Allah and His apostle that he may judge between them, lo! a party of them are averters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When they are summoned to Allah and His Apostle that He may judge between them, behold, a part of them turn aside.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When they are summoned to Allah and His messenger, in order that He may judge between them, behold some of them decline (to come).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when they are called to Allah (i.e. His Words, the Quran) and His Messenger (SAW), to judge between them, lo! a party of them refuse (to come) and turn away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when they are called to Allah and His Messenger so that he judges between them, a party of them swerve away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when they are called to God and His Messenger, in order to judge between them, some of them refuse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when they are called to [the words of] Allah and His Messenger to judge between them, at once a party of them turns aside [in refusal].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [24:48] And when they are summoned to God and His Messenger, who conveys His words, that he may judge between them, behold, a party of them are averse, to come to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when they appeal unto Allah) when they are called to the Book of Allah (and His messenger to judge between them) by Allah's Book, (lo! a faction of them are averse) from the Book of Allah and the judgement of the Messenger;
